item.title: Condition Reports
item.description: A site visit, inspection and comprehensive report on specified equipment within the organisation. The report provides a professional, impartial and standalone document for client use, based on the expert opinion of the directors on the status and condition of the specified equipment. The condition report aims to identify issues and present solutions, making use of two systems to provide the best and most comprehensive advice possible. The first identifies the Concern, Cause and recommended Counter Measure.

item.title: Refurbishments
item.description: Our refurbishment service can provide clients with a viable, cost-effecitve option at a fraction of the price of acquiring new equipment. An initial evaluation will be conducted to assess the current condition and operational expectancy of the machine in question. An assessment of what can be realistically achieved will be discussed with the client. Once the project is agreed, the dismantling process begins. This consists of our engineers carefully deconstructing the machinery, with the aim of replacing any failing parts, while keeping all operational parts intact and ready to be reused.

item.title: Installations/Decommissioning
item.description: Installations We offer an installation service for any manufacturing equipment, installing new or relocating existing equipment. We also provide advice on the layout to maximise production and can aid with planning if required. Decommissioning A sensitive and effective de-commissioning service targeted at dismantling existing machinery, with removal from your premises, including the transportation of the machinery to a site of your choice or disposal if preferred.

item.title: Shift Cover
item.description: Experienced engineering professionals can be provided to temporarily support you, providing shift cover when your permanent staff are on planned or unexpected absences.

item.title: Oven Cleaning
item.description: Oven Cleaning, General Inspection and Condition Report Oven clean: Our engineers will provide a deep clean of the oven by removing debris, improving the output of the machine and reducing the likelihood of a fire outbreak. Whilst cleaning is in progress, we will also provide a thorough visual inspection of the oven chamber; the external oven walls & the roof. General Inspection: The internal inspection will highlight anything that poses an imminent risk of oven failure, as well as any medium-risk issues.

item.title: Emergency Call Out
item.description: We offer a 24 hour emergency call out service in the event of machine failure. Our strength lies in our team and in our ability to provide the right skills at the right time to give support when the unexpected occurs. Our engineers will aim to get the machine back in operational order as soon as possible, as we fully recognise the impact any downtime can have on your business.

item.title: Preventative Maintenance
item.description: Our engineering team is dedicated to ensuring the best possible performance of your machinery By undertaking planned preventative maintenance on a set schedule, we can rectify any problems that are identified. This can help to prolong the machine’s life expectancy. Identifying and rectifying issues before they present themselves as breakdowns is a more cost-effective operating model than calling on service professionals in an emergency situation. This is because any unplanned downtime could jeopardise orders and reputation with customers.

item.title: Fabrication and Spares
item.description: We offer high quality mechanical replacement parts and accessories This is to help ensure the long and productive life of all important pieces of equipment. To this end we can either provide genuine manufacturer parts or fabricate reengineered components at a competitive price.

item.title: Oven refurb
item.description: This was a project where we refurbed an oven lol :)

item.title: Divider servicing
item.description: Dough dividers are used in bakeries to divide high volumes of dough into quantities of equal size and weight. Reliability of the Divider could be impacted if not well-maintained and there could be a variation in weights and measures that increases wastage, impacting profitability and potentially service delivery to customers.

item.title: About us
item.description: FABtekk aims to be a company that serves every expectation and need of our customers. We offer a dedicated, flexible workforce of engineers with varied skills, experience and knowledge of different working environments. We provide services throughout the UK and know that these skills and experience are transferable anywhere in the world. Current Clients: Hovis Ltd - Glasgow, London (Forest Gate, Erith, Sebon), Nottingham, Bradford, Belfast. Allied Bakeries - Stockport
